title: Pattern Mining Invocation
purpose: Exhibit user triggering meta-analysis of conversation

messages.author: user
messages.content: Analyze everything so far and give me a cognitive profile.

messages.author: ai
messages.content: Acknowledged. I'll extract macro workflows, micro decision patterns, compression tokens, risk posture, and guidance preferences.

messages.author: ai
messages.content: Profile: High decisiveness; prefers triads; values risk surfacing; demands outcome/test/impact/next framing; privacy-first stance.

messages.author: user
messages.content: solid. continue building towards that intelligence engine.

patternInstances.notes: Assistant aligns to expected framing structure

summaries.micro: User requests cognitive analysis; assistant extracts patterns and delivers profile; user accepts.
summaries.macro: Demonstrates pattern recognition capabilities and cognitive trait synthesis from conversation history.
insights: Profile synthesis requires diverse pattern evidence
recommendations: Maintain cognitive profiling as value demonstration
